channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Tizen wearable devices
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Tizen wearable devices

item.title: CVE-2021-25434|2024-08-03T20:03:05.655Z -- samsung%20mobile -- tizen%20wearable%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Tizen bootloader prior to Firmware update JUL-2021 Release allows arbitrary code execution using param partition in wireless firmware download mode.

item.title: CVE-2021-25433|2024-08-03T20:03:05.635Z -- samsung%20mobile -- tizen%20wearable%20devices
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Tizen factory reset policy prior to Firmware update JUL-2021 Release allows untrusted applications to perform factory reset using dbus signal.

item.title: CVE-2021-25424|2024-08-03T20:03:05.579Z -- samsung%20mobile -- tizen%20wearable%20devices
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Tizen bluetooth-frwk prior to Firmware update JUN-2021 Release allows bluetooth attacker to take over the user's bluetooth device without user awareness.

item.title: CVE-2021-25435|2024-08-03T20:03:05.748Z -- samsung%20mobile -- tizen%20wearable%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Tizen bootloader prior to Firmware update JUL-2021 Release allows arbitrary code execution using recovery partition in wireless firmware download mode.

item.title: CVE-2021-25436|2024-08-03T20:03:05.698Z -- samsung%20mobile -- tizen%20wearable%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Tizen FOTA service prior to Firmware update JUL-2021 Release allows arbitrary code execution via Samsung Accessory Protocol.

item.title: CVE-2021-25437|2024-08-03T20:03:05.658Z -- samsung%20mobile -- tizen%20wearable%20devices
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Tizen FOTA service prior to Firmware update JUL-2021 Release allows attackers to arbitrary code execution by replacing FOTA update file.
